message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, considering the inflation will affect you more than me.
Your proposal was unfair to me considering the inflation. Let's split it equally.
Bob, it's in our best interest to settle this quickly. I'm proposing a slightly better deal for you, considering the inflation will continue to erode your share.
Alice, this is a fair offer considering the circumstances. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at the value any further.
